instruction.title: Color
instruction.text: In the text, VIEW highlights the words will, would, have, and had.

instruction.title: Click
instruction.text: Click on each example of the words 'will', 'would', 'have', and 'had' you find in the text and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong.

instruction.title: Multiple Choice
instruction.text: Choose either 'will', 'would', 'have', or 'had' from the drop-down list and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong. You can get help by clicking on ?.

instruction.title: Fill in the blanks
instruction.text: Fill in the blanks with the correct word from will, would, have, and had. If you guessed wrong or you find it too difficult you can get help by clicking on ?.
